en.answer:
When the effect of Drytron Alpha Thuban is activated in the hand, it is an effect that Special Summons a monster from your hand, and not an effect that Special Summons a monster from the Graveyard. Therefore, you cannot activate the effect of Ghost Belle & Haunted Mansion in response to the effect of Drytron Alpha Thuban activated in your hand.

When the effect of Drytron Alpha Thuban is activated in the Graveyard, it is an effect that Special Summons a monster from the Graveyard, and not an effect that Special Summons a monster from your hand. Therefore, you can activate the effect of Ghost Belle & Haunted Mansion in response to the effect of Drytron Alpha Thuban activated in the Graveyard.

~~~

This also applies to the other cards, among others: Drytron Zeta Aldhibah, Drytron Beta Rastaban, Drytron Delta Altais, Sacred Fire King Garunix, Centur-Ion Emeth VI, Dark Hole Dragon, Nemleria Dream Devourer - Reveil, Infinitrack Road Roller, The Abyss Dragon Swordsoul, Basiltrice, Familiar of the Evil Eye, Diabolica the Draconique General, Stardust Wurm, Chaos Nephthys, Leafplace Plaice, Blue-Eyes Jet Dragon, War Rock Bashileos, Stardust Trail, Supreme Sovereign Serpent of Golgonda, Thunder Hand, Left-Hand Shark, Mathmech Sigma, Marincess Mandarin, Galactic Spiral Dragon, Simorgh of Darkness, Vic Viper T301, Gizmek Orochi, the Serpentron Sky Slasher, Palladium Oracle Mana, Salamangreat Fennec, Yuki-Musume, the Ice Mayakashi, Omni Dragon Brotaur, Token Collector, Mana Dragon Zirnitron, Darkest Diabolos, Lord of the Lair, Sea Archiver, Illusionist Faceless Magician, Sacred Arch-Airknight Parshath, Destrudo the Lost Dragon's Frisson, Amazoness Baby Tiger, Salvagent Driver, Tuning Magician, Graydle Slime, Mirror Resonator, Keeper of the Shrine, Zefraxa, Flame Beast of the Nekroz, Tempest, Dragon Ruler of Storms, and Green Baboon, Defender of the Forest.
en.question: Can I activate the effect of Ghost Belle & Haunted Mansion in response to the ①st effect of Drytron Alpha Thuban?
en.title: Can the effect of Ghost Belle & Haunted Mansion be activated in response to the effect of Drytron Alpha Thuban?

ja.question: 「<<15635>>」の『①』の『自分の手札・フィールドから、このカード以外の「ドライトロン」モンスターまたは儀式モンスター１体をリリースして発動できる。このカードを手札・墓地から守備表示で特殊召喚する。その後、デッキから儀式モンスター１体を手札に加える事ができる』効果に対して、「<<13587>>」の効果を発動できますか？
ja.title: 「<<15635>>」の効果に対して「<<13587>>」の効果を発動できますか？
